channel.title: Anybody like word games? I found a really fun site
channel.description:
Website: http://www.eastoftheweb.com/games/
This has got to be the best game! Just try it! :D http://www.eastoftheweb.com/cgi-bin/go_daily_game.pl?game_id=Cryptoquote&id=0
If you have trouble on that game, I finished it, and here is the solution. http://img120.imageshack.us/my.php?image=cryptxz8.jpg
I hope you like the site! :)
~Ron
PS: Since, I'm not advertising this website, I do not need permission from Mopar. I'm just pointing out a fun game. :P

Aw man, I got a different game than you, now I can’t cheat,
